greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: 3n - S(n) (see A068119).
mathematica: ce[n_] := Length[NestWhileList[#*Ceiling[#] &, n + 1/4, ! IntegerQ[#] &]] - 1; nn = Range[83]; t = Accumulate[ce /@ nn]; Table[3 n - t[[n]], {n, nn}] (* _Jayanta Basu_, Jul 30 2013 *)
results.author: _Benoit Cloitre_, Aug 30 2002
